name: HR Summit & Expo
content: Be part of the Middle East’s biggest HR show. 5000+ Attendees | 110+ Exhibitors | 140+ Speakers | 125+ Sessions | 3 Days | 1 Transformational Experience MENA’s biggest event for Human Resources and talent development industry. HR Summit & Expo (HRSE) features keynotes, seminars and the biggest exhibition for HR. Our newly developed HR Tech focused content, exhibition and features are here to drive and change the way HR works in the modern world.
